Description: Very special two bedroom two bathroom condominium with off Street parking! 1356 square feet, this lovely home features high ceilings, many windows, modern kitchen, wonderful deck, two full baths, two great sized bedrooms, charming detail, and an off street parking space! Gorgeous condominium building with pristine landscaping. Heat, Hot Water, Water / Sewer included. Close to: Public transportation, several great restaurants, shops and cafes, parks, and more!
